resources.string: CHelix is the official club of Civil department for fest nimbus.
Ojas is the official club of EEE department for fest nimbus.
Medextrous is the official club of Mechanical department for fest nimbus.
Vibhav is the official club of ECE department for fest nimbus.
Team .exe is the official club of CSE department for fest nimbus.
Design-o-crats is the official club of Architecture department for fest nimbus.
Hermetica is the official club of Chemical department for fest nimbus.
Vitruvians is the official club of Architecture for fest nimbus.

NIMBUS is the annual technical festival of National Institute of Technology, Hamirpur, Himachal Pradesh, India. It is touted to be an amalgamation of ideas, expressions, innovations, prototypes, knowledge channels, taken to the most premier levels. Nimbus has become the biggest technical festival of Northern India.
NIMBUS is the annual technical festival of NIT Hamirpur, Himachal Pradesh, India. Nimbus has become the biggest technical festival of Northern India.
A Open Source Project by AppTeam NITH for TechFest Nimbus2k16.\n\nSource code available at GitHub.

We thank the open source community for all their contributions.

The following are third party software/api that are used in Nimbus app.

 	Glide

 	Android Volley Library

 	Load Toast

 	Android Shape ImageView

by AppTeam
2nd - 3rd April, 8am - 8pm
Venue: Auditorium

 "A hackathon, a hacker neologism, is an event when programmers meet to do collaborative computer programming." 
-Wikipedia

 This is NITH's first Hackathon being organised by the AppTeam NITH. This event aims at unleashing the innovative abilities of students and highlighting their creativity. As participants require technical assistance, being not very technically sound, it was decided that the participants would be teamed under the Mentors from final year CSE. Teams would be required to build any viable application/library/software in stipulated time of 24 hours. The best innovation will be awarded.


List of Mentors/Team Leaders:-

 1. Aniket Verma
 2. Pradyot 
 3. Shubham Choudhary
 4. Himanshu Singh
 5. Sagar Karira
 6. Prateek Prasher
 7. Akshendra Pratap
 8. Mayank Bansal
 9. Rohan Jaswal
 10. Kunal Sharma
 11. Shubham Rana


Rules:

 1. Participants must register at website or through app.
 2. Teams participants must be from NITH/IITU.
 3. Participants have liberty to list Preference of their Mentors.
 4. Participants will be alloted a team Mentor randomly or based upon skills/preferences.
 5. List of Mentors are given above.(can be changed)
 6. In case of any discrepancy the final decision will be that of Appteam/Judges.
 7. Participants must be present at the event site.


Awarding Schemes:

Winner: 3 Virtual Gold Coins + Additional 35 Virtual Silver Coins

First Runner Up: 2 Virtual Gold Coins + Additional 25 Virtual Silver Coins

Second Runner Up: 1 Virtual Gold Coins + Additional 15 Virtual Silver Coins

Every participants will be awarded 25 Virtual Silver Coins.
 Linux must be installed in all participant systems.

Victory Begins in the Heart. The Tradition Continues ...

C-Helix is the departmental team representing Civil Engineering department in Annual tech Fest of NIT Hamirpur. Encompassing some of the most brilliant as well as hardworking students of civil engineering, this team is the young face of future constructors who unveil their innovative potentials in field of ideas and skills at the technical fest NIMBUS. This team is Ushered by the expert guidance of Faculty Co-ordinator Dr. Vijay Shankar Dogra, along with Core Co-ordinators Anurag Sharma And Mohit Rattan, to materialize it’s imaginary goals into three dimensional prototypes.

Team OJAS is the departmental team Electrical Engineering Dept. and has a very prestigous reputation in NIMBUS for its amazing and innovative Events and Demonstrations which tackle real life problems. The Team is led by the ever Vibrant and Energetic Dr. Veena Sharma.\n

We are the “DEXTERS” of Mechanical Engineering. We represent the Mechanical Engineering Department in NIMBUS - Technical Fest of NIT Hamirpur. We organize several events and fabricate mechanical models and prototypes for exhibition during NIMBUS.\n

The departmental team of ECE, Vibhav works for beneficial of society via innovating and inculcating in Electronics. Team Vibhav is coming with a socio-techno exhibition TECHNOVATION exhibiting different real time application based models, along with many technical as well as fun events, this Nimbus.\n

Not always you can see past the veil of refined outputs. Sometimes everything has to be put into a package and delivered as the ultimate result.

We do that.
We are .eXe

With this year's logical and cryptic events and innovative projects you'll not only have to wonder, but you'll also have fun and learn a lot at the same time.
This Nimbus, we execute it all.

Design-O-Crats, the official team of architecture department Nit Hamirpur has been an integral part of the technical fest nimbus of the college pouring creativity and aesthetics every time in a whole new way. We at Design-O-Crats think beyond imagination and try to bring the fantasy into reality. Our motto is to enhance the aesthetical and user friendly characteristics of space because relationship between technology and human can only be achieved by design.Even in this Era.

TEAM HERMETICA is for the first time a full fledged team with a strength of 3 years equalling all other departmental teams. This year we have a plethora of events covering various aspects of humans pursuit to understand nature and to direct it towards benefitting mankind through the versatile field of study that is CHEMICAL ENGINEERING.\n

Please visit the website by clicking here. 

Whats new this Nimbus ?

 1. This Nimbus, we are committed to provide you ease in registering for the events. Just open any event and click on REGISTER.

 2. We have introduced 2 COINS and a leaderboard to show you where you stand.
 SILVER COINS -> Denotes your level of participation
 GOLD COINS -> Denotes your level of performance

 3. You will be rewarded 25 SILVER coins for every participation (not registration).

 4. You will be rewarded 3, 2, 1 Gold Coins for 1st, 2nd and 3rd position in an event

 5. Points will be reflected only after your participation is confirmed by the team.

 6. These coins can be used to redeem coupons at the end of NIMBUS.
